data.title: Westminster Private School Admissions
data.meta_description: Virginia private school for grades kindergarten through 8th, based in Annandale with students throughout Northern Virginia
data.text:
THE ADMISSION OFFICE WELCOMES YOU!

Westminster School seeks families who are looking to nurture and challenge their children with a high quality and time-tested educational program of exceptional breadth and depth.

Do you want the following for your child?

A welcoming environment where your child’s individuality is recognized, respected, and celebrated;

Small classes, which provide individual attention for your child;

Daily extra-help sessions and a resource center, which support your child’s academic progress and development;

Broad and inclusive opportunities in the arts and athletics, which will develop your child’s creativity, confidence, and enthusiasm;

Myriad extracurricular activities, including field trips, athletics, after-school enrichment classes, and clubs to meet a wide variety of interests;

A carefully selected faculty of qualified teachers who are specialists in their subjects;

An environment of courtesy, good manners, and good behavior;

Many fun traditions that bond you and your child within a warm, supportive and diverse community.

If this sounds like a good fit for your family, contact our Admissions Office to learn more.

Apply Now

Schedule a Visit
